citation.case_name: Paschal Et Ux. v. Flagstar Bank, Fsb (Two Judgments)

html:
537 U.S. 1227

PASCHAL ET UX.
v.
FLAGSTAR BANK, FSB (two judgments).

No. 02-961.

Supreme Court of United States.

February 24, 2003.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE SIXTH CIRCUIT.

2

C. A. 6th Cir. Motion of Fair Housing Center of Metropolitan Detroit for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 295 F. 3d 565 (first judgment); 297 F. 3d 431 (second judgment).
